## Overview

This is a short course on linear models using the R programming language. 

Each day will comprise a lecture in the morning at 11am, followed by a tutorial in the afternoon at 1pm.

During the first session we will cover how to install R and RStudio on your laptop, see [these instructions](install-update-r.html).
